channel.title: How to remove interface/overlay on player teleport ? [508]

item.title: How to remove interface/overlay on player teleport ? [508]
item.dc:creator: @fashofasho fashofasho
item.description:
@fashofasho wrote:

Hey alright, so ive made custom barrows/godwars/ and barbarian assault all with overlay interfaces, but when the player teleports the interface stays, how can i have it removed when they tele?
heres a code i found - p.actionSender.removeOverlayÂ§;
but i need to take it away on a tele, any help is appreciated

Read full topic
